font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 勤勉的，辛勤的： characterized by steady, earnest, and energetic effort: painstaking
【例】 A new bride is diligent for three days.
【例】 a student who has been diligent in pursuit of a degree in mathematics. 一个不断勤奋追求数学学位的学生
【近】 assiduous, industrious, sedulous, engaged, hopping, tied-up
【反】 idle, inactive, unbusy, unemployed, unoccupied 空闲的
